sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './userDetails.css'; // Import CSS file import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, CardFooter, Label, Form, FormGroup, Input, Col, Alert } from "reactstrap"; const CustomerDetailsForm = () => { // State for location const [latitude, setLatitude] = useState(''); const [longitude, setLongitude] = useState(''); const [accuracy, setAccuracy] = useState(''); // State for captured images const [selfieCaptured, setSelfieCaptured] = useState(false); const [shopPhotoCaptured, setShopPhotoCaptured] = useState(false); // State for form fields const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ first_name: '', last_name: '', guardian_name: '', relation_with_guardian: '', guardian_occupation: '', dob: '', pan_number: '', mobile: '', email: '', gender: '', occupation_category: '', other_occupation: '', business_type: '', monthly_income: '', loan_amount: '', loan_category: '', employment_type: '', salary_received_type: '', company_name: '', type_of_loan: '', shop_type: '', education_level: '', insurance: '', shop_road_type: '', home_address: '', home_city: '', home_state: '', home_pincode: '', business_address: '', business_city: '', business_state: '', business_pincode: '' }); useEffect(() => { // Fetch user's geolocation navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition( (position) => { setLatitude(position.coords.latitude); setLongitude(position.coords.longitude); setAccuracy(position.coords.accuracy); }, (error) => { console.error('Error getting user location:', error); } ); }, []); // Empty dependency array ensures effect runs only once // Handle capturing selfie or shop photo const capturePhoto = (type) => { // Implement capturing logic if (type === 'selfie') { // Capture selfie logic setSelfieCaptured(true); } else if (type === 'shop') { // Capture shop photo logic setShopPhotoCaptured(true); } }; // Handle form field changes const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Implement form submission logic console.log('Form submitted with data:', formData); }; return (
Loan Application Request Form {/* Add form fields */}
{['Small Value Business Loan (50k - 2L)', 'High Value Business loan (2L - 7L)'].map((loan_type, index) => (
))}
{/* Add other form fields similarly */}

{selfieCaptured && ( )}

{shopPhotoCaptured && ( )}
); }; export default CustomerDetailsForm;
